import React from "react"; import leftImg from "../img/item-4.png"; import item1 from "../img/item-1.png"; import item2 from "../img/item-2.png"; import item3 from "../img/item-9.png"; class Details extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { productsNum: 0, products: [], }; } increasePro = () => { this.setState({ productsNum: +1 }); }; render() { const { description, name, price } = this.props.products[1]; return ( <>

{name}

{description}

Color: Pink

MORE PRODUCTS ); } } export default Details;
